content:
A mixture of MnCl2·4H2O (19.8 mg, 0.1 mmol), L1 (40.0 mg, 0.1 mmol), NaSCN (8.5 mg, 0.1 mmol) in CH3OH (6.0 mL), and CHCl3 (12.0 mL) was stirred and then sealed in a 20 mL Teflon-lined autoclave. The autoclave was heated to 110 °C and held at that temperature for 7 days, and then cooled to 80 °C and maintained at that temperature for 1 day, followed by further cooling to room temperature. Yellow crystals of 1 were collected in 25% yield based on ligand. Anal. Calcd. for C28H30N6O8S2Mn: C, 48.21; H, 4.33; N, 12.05; S, 9.19. Found: C, 47.86; H, 4.83; N, 12.41; S, 8.93%. IR (KBr, cm–1): 3758w, 3402s, 2875w, 2373m, 1808m, 1574s, 1408s, 1270w, 1117s, 909w, 610s, 488s.

{[Mn(L<sub>2</sub>)<sub>2</sub>(NCS)<sub>2</sub>(CH<sub>3</sub>OH)<sub>2</sub>]}<italic toggle="yes"> <sub>n</sub> </italic> (<bold>2</bold>)

2 was prepared in the same way for 1 by using corresponding L2 instead of L1. Yellow crystals of 2 were collected in 20% yield based on ligand. Anal. Calcd. for C48H36N10O10S2Mn: C, 55.87; H, 3.52; N, 13.57; S, 6.21. Found: C, 55.35; H, 3.86; N, 13.19; S, 5.83%. IR (KBr, cm–1): 3440s, 2925w, 1773m, 1718s, 1648s, 1621m, 1567w, 1429m, 1393s, 1365m, 1313w, 1119s, 1090s, 944m, 790w, 727m, 630m, 487m.

{[Mn(L<sub>3</sub>)<sub>2</sub>(NCS)<sub>2</sub>]·0.5CH<sub>3</sub>OH·4.5H<sub>2</sub>O}<italic toggle="yes"> <sub>n</sub> </italic> (<bold>3</bold>)

3 was prepared in the same way for 1 by using corresponding L3 instead of L1. Yellow crystals of 3 were collected in 20% yield based on ligand. Anal. Calcd. for C54.5H43N10O13S2Mn: C, 56.18; H, 3.72; N, 12.02; S, 5.50. Found: C, 56.34; H, 3.53; N, 12.13; S, 5.63%. IR (KBr, cm–1): 3432s, 2915w, 2370w, 2343w, 2064w, 1705w, 1576s, 1406m, 1343w, 1070s, 652m, 467m.

{[Cd(L<sub>1</sub>)I<sub>2</sub>]·3(H<sub>2</sub>O)}<italic toggle="yes"> <sub>n</sub> </italic> (<bold>4</bold>)

A solution of CdI2 (36.6 mg, 0.1 mmol) in CH3OH (3 mL) was carefully layered onto a solution of L1 (40.0 mg, 0.1 mmol) in CHCl3 (10.0 mL) in a test tube. The solution was left to stand for 2 weeks at room temperature, and white crystals appeared in 30% yield based on the ligand. Anal. Calcd. for C22H20N4O7I2Cd: C, 32.28; H, 2.46; N, 6.84. Found: C, 32.15; H, 2.90; N, 6.57%. IR (KBr, cm–1): 3436w, 2098s, 1776m, 1732vs, 1617m, 1566w, 1425m, 1388s, 1368s, 1332w, 1124m, 1070w, 1020w, 946m, 781w, 730m, 630w, 585w, 477m.

{[Cd(L<sub>2</sub>)I<sub>2</sub>]]}<sub> <italic toggle="yes">n</italic> </sub> (<bold>5</bold>)

5 was prepared in the same way for 4 by using corresponding L2 instead of L1. Yellow crystals appeared in 40% yield based on the ligand. Anal. Calcd. for C22H14N4O4I2Cd: C, 34.56; H, 1.85; N, 7.33. Found: C, 34.30; H, 1.97; N, 7.37%. IR (KBr, cm–1): 3460w, 1766 m, 1710vs, 1607w, 1433w, 1391s, 1333m, 1310w, 1096w, 1053w, 928w, 705 m, 633w, 558w.

{[Cd(L<sub>3</sub>)(NCS)<sub>2</sub>]·2.5(H<sub>2</sub>O)}<sub> <italic toggle="yes">n</italic> </sub> (<bold>6</bold>)

A mixture of CdI2 (36.6 mg, 0.1 mmol), L3 (40.0 mg, 0.1 mmol), NaSCN (8.5 mg, 0.1 mmol) in CH3OH (6.0 mL) and CHCl3 (12.0 mL) was stirred and then sealed in a 20 mL Teflon-lined autoclave. The autoclave was heated to 110 °C and held at that temperature for 7 days, then cooled to 80 °C and maintained at that temperature for 1 day, followed by further cooling to room temperature. Orange crystals appeared in 36% yield based on the ligand. Anal. Calcd. for C28H21N6O6.5S2Cd: C, 46.58; H, 2.93; N, 11.64; S, 8.88. Found: C, 46.73; H, 2.85; N, 11.98; S, 8.57%. IR (KBr, cm–1): 3431s, 2102m, 2067w, 1707m, 1667s, 1573vs, 1408m, 1339m, 1248w, 1096s, 766w, 615w, 485m.

{[Co(L<sub>1</sub>)<sub>2</sub>(NCS)<sub>2</sub>]·4(H<sub>2</sub>O)}<sub> <italic toggle="yes">n</italic> </sub> (<bold>7</bold>)

A mixture of CoCl2·4H2O (20.2 mg, 0.1 mmol), L1 (40.0 mg, 0.1 mmol), NaSCN (8.5 mg, 0.1 mmol) in CH3OH (6.0 mL) and CHCl3 (12.0 mL) was stirred and then sealed in a 20 mL Teflon-lined autoclave. The autoclave was heated to 110 °C and held at that temperature for 7 days, then cooled to 80 °C and maintained at that temperature for 1 day, followed by further cooling to room temperature. Yellow crystals of 7 were collected in 35% yield based on ligand. Anal. Calcd. for C46H36N10O12S2Co: C, 52.93; H, 3.48; N, 13.42; S, 6.14. Found: C, 52.56; H, 3.54; N, 13.46; S, 6.32%. IR (KBr, cm–1): 3414s, 2961w, 2924w, 2853w, 2051vs, 1772m, 1713vs, 1616 m, 1567w, 1423m, 1391vs, 1350w, 1308w, 1120m, 1084w, 1017w, 933m, 801m, 726m, 631w, 490w.

{[Co(L<sub>2</sub>)<sub>2</sub>(NCS)<sub>2</sub>]·(HCCl<sub>3</sub>)}<sub> <italic toggle="yes">n</italic> </sub> (<bold>8</bold>)

8 was prepared in the same way for 7 by using corresponding L2 instead of L1. Yellow crystals of 8 were collected in 20% yield based on ligand. Anal. Calcd. for C47H29N10O8S2Cl3Co: C, 51.73; H, 2.68; N, 12.84; S, 5.88. Found: C, 51.58; H, 3.04; N, 12.46; S, 5.62%. IR (KBr, cm–1): 3467s, 2112s, 2067 m, 1770w, 1712vs, 1609w, 1436w, 1392s, 1346 m, 1309w, 1094 m, 1057w, 935w, 803w, 734w, 705w, 562w, 480w.

{[Co(L<sub>3</sub>)<sub>2</sub>(NCS)<sub>2</sub>]·3(H<sub>2</sub>O)}<sub> <italic toggle="yes">n</italic> </sub> (<bold>9</bold>)

9 was prepared in the same way for 7 by using corresponding L3 instead of L1. Yellow crystals of 9 were collected in 20% yield based on ligand. Anal. Calcd. for C54H38N10O11S2Co: C, 57.60; H, 3.40; N, 12.44; S, 5.70. Found: C, 57.55; H, 3.65; N, 12.46; S, 5.38%. IR (KBr, cm–1): 3442m, 2915w, 2051s, 1708s, 1669vs, 1615m, 1582w, 1452m, 1422w, 1372w, 1338s, 1247m, 1182w, 1094w, 1003w, 803w, 765m, 563w.

Synthesis of Complexes 1-9 

{[Mn(L1)(NCS)2(CH3OH)2]⋅2(CH3OH)} n  (1)

A mixture of MnCl2⋅4H2O (19.8 mg, 0.1 mmol), L1 (40.0 mg, 0.1 mmol), NaSCN (8.5 mg, 0.1 mmol) in CH3OH (6.0 mL), and CHCl3 (12.0 mL) was stirred and then sealed in a 20 mL Teflon-lined autoclave. The autoclave was heated to 110 °C and held at that temperature for 7 days, and then cooled to 80 °C and maintained at that temperature for 1 day, followed by further cooling to room temperature. Yellow crystals of 1 were collected in 25% yield based on ligand. Anal. Calcd. for C28H30N6O8S2Mn: C, 48.21; H, 4.33; N, 12.05; S, 9.19. Found: C, 47.86; H, 4.83; N, 12.41; S, 8.93%. IR (KBr, cm-1): 3758w, 3402s, 2875w, 2373m, 1808m, 1574s, 1408s, 1270w, 1117s, 909w, 610s, 488s.

{[Mn(L2)2(NCS)2(CH3OH)2]} n  (2)

 2 was prepared in the same way for 1 by using corresponding L2 instead of L1. Yellow crystals of 2 were collected in 20% yield based on ligand. Anal. Calcd. for C48H36N10O10S2Mn: C, 55.87; H, 3.52; N, 13.57; S, 6.21. Found: C, 55.35; H, 3.86; N, 13.19; S, 5.83%. IR (KBr, cm-1): 3440s, 2925w, 1773m, 1718s, 1648s, 1621m, 1567w, 1429m, 1393s, 1365m, 1313w, 1119s, 1090s, 944m, 790w, 727m, 630m, 487m.

{[Mn(L3)2(NCS)2]⋅0.5CH3OH⋅4.5H2O} n  (3)

 3 was prepared in the same way for 1 by using corresponding L3 instead of L1. Yellow crystals of 3 were collected in 20% yield based on ligand. Anal. Calcd. for C54.5H43N10O13S2Mn: C, 56.18; H, 3.72; N, 12.02; S, 5.50. Found: C, 56.34; H, 3.53; N, 12.13; S, 5.63%. IR (KBr, cm-1): 3432s, 2915w, 2370w, 2343w, 2064w, 1705w, 1576s, 1406m, 1343w, 1070s, 652m, 467m.

{[Cd(L1)I2]⋅3(H2O)} n  (4)

A solution of CdI2 (36.6 mg, 0.1 mmol) in CH3OH (3 mL) was carefully layered onto a solution of L1 (40.0 mg, 0.1 mmol) in CHCl3 (10.0 mL) in a test tube. The solution was left to stand for 2 weeks at room temperature, and white crystals appeared in 30% yield based on the ligand. Anal. Calcd. for C22H20N4O7I2Cd: C, 32.28; H, 2.46; N, 6.84. Found: C, 32.15; H, 2.90; N, 6.57%. IR (KBr, cm-1): 3436w, 2098s, 1776m, 1732vs, 1617m, 1566w, 1425m, 1388s, 1368s, 1332w, 1124m, 1070w, 1020w, 946m, 781w, 730m, 630w, 585w, 477m.

{[Cd(L2)I2]]} n  (5)

 5 was prepared in the same way for 4 by using corresponding L2 instead of L1. Yellow crystals appeared in 40% yield based on the ligand. Anal. Calcd. for C22H14N4O4I2Cd: C, 34.56; H, 1.85; N, 7.33. Found: C, 34.30; H, 1.97; N, 7.37%. IR (KBr, cm-1): 3460w, 1766 m, 1710vs, 1607w, 1433w, 1391s, 1333m, 1310w, 1096w, 1053w, 928w, 705 m, 633w, 558w.

{[Cd(L3)(NCS)2]⋅2.5(H2O)} n  (6)

A mixture of CdI2 (36.6 mg, 0.1 mmol), L3 (40.0 mg, 0.1 mmol), NaSCN (8.5 mg, 0.1 mmol) in CH3OH (6.0 mL) and CHCl3 (12.0 mL) was stirred and then sealed in a 20 mL Teflon-lined autoclave. The autoclave was heated to 110 °C and held at that temperature for 7 days, then cooled to 80 °C and maintained at that temperature for 1 day, followed by further cooling to room temperature. Orange crystals appeared in 36% yield based on the ligand. Anal. Calcd. for C28H21N6O6.5S2Cd: C, 46.58; H, 2.93; N, 11.64; S, 8.88. Found: C, 46.73; H, 2.85; N, 11.98; S, 8.57%. IR (KBr, cm-1): 3431s, 2102m, 2067w, 1707m, 1667s, 1573vs, 1408m, 1339m, 1248w, 1096s, 766w, 615w, 485m.

{[Co(L1)2(NCS)2]⋅4(H2O)} n  (7)

A mixture of CoCl2⋅4H2O (20.2 mg, 0.1 mmol), L1 (40.0 mg, 0.1 mmol), NaSCN (8.5 mg, 0.1 mmol) in CH3OH (6.0 mL) and CHCl3 (12.0 mL) was stirred and then sealed in a 20 mL Teflon-lined autoclave. Yellow crystals of 7 were collected in 35% yield based on ligand. Anal. Calcd. for C46H36N10O12S2Co: C, 52.93; H, 3.48; N, 13.42; S, 6.14. Found: C, 52.56; H, 3.54; N, 13.46; S, 6.32%. IR (KBr, cm-1): 3442m, 2915w, 2051s, 1708s, 1669vs, 1615m, 1582w, 1452m, 1422w, 1372w, 1338s, 1247m, 1182w, 1094w, 1003w, 803w, 765m, 563w.
